main event: Captain Mosley observed an unidentified flying object on 27 February 1965 at Fort Benning, Georgia.
interesting points: The object was observed as a bright light that reached an intensity greater than the brightest star in the sky.,The observation lasted for 30 seconds while the light trail remained visible for 30 minutes.,The object's course was upward towards the northeast.,Initial reports suggested it could be a re-entering satellite or meteor.,Another officer also witnessed the sighting.
sighted object: a bright light in the sky
witness description: Captain Howard R. Mosley and another officer
